chapter.title: Blog posts that should be chapters

intro.p: Following is a list of blog posts that should ultimately have their content merged in with the rest of the book. Unfortunately, I just haven't had time to do so yet.

ul.li: The Magic of Yesod, part 2 December 25, 2010 Continues the previous blog post, covering the static subsite, parseRoutes and mkYesod
The Magic of Yesod, part 1 December 23, 2010 Explains the basics of Template Haskell and Quasi-Quotation, and how it ties in with Hamlet, Cassius and Julius
Custom Forms and the Form Monad October 20, 2010 Explains a new way of creating forms introduced in Yesod 0.6.
Ajax Push July 22, 2010 An extension of the basic chat example to use Ajax push.
The Handler Monad July 15, 2010 Slightly out-of-date, as we've migrated back to a form of either monad transformer.
Fringe benefits of type-safe URLs June 24, 2010 Covers breadcrumbs, dedicated static file servers and authorization.
